propChildren: In most cases will simply be a string containing a title for the label.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propIcon: Override the default label of the step icon.
propStepIconComponent: The component to render in place of the [`StepIcon`](/api/step-icon/).
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesHorizontal: Styles applied to the root element if `orientation="horizontal"`.
stylesVertical: Styles applied to the root element if `orientation="vertical"`.
stylesLabel: Styles applied to the `Typography` component which wraps `children`.
stylesActive: Pseudo-class applied to the `Typography` component if `active={true}`.
stylesCompleted: Pseudo-class applied to the `Typography` component if `completed={true}`.
stylesError: Pseudo-class applied to the root element and `Typography` component if `error={true}`.
stylesDisabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element and `Typography` component if `disabled={true}`.
stylesIconContainer: Styles applied to the `icon` container element.
stylesAlternativeLabel: Pseudo-class applied to the root and icon container and `Typography` if `alternativeLabel={true}`.
stylesLabelContainer: Styles applied to the container element which wraps `Typography` and `optional`.
